title: Group Therapy: Does She Hang the Painting?
description: "Teresa" emailed in about a Christmas present she was given by a friend of a painting she did of her and her boyfriend.  She looks good in it but her boyfriend looks like Uncle Fester.  Now her friend is moving in with her for a couple months and she's wondering if she has to hang the painting even though she hates it.
itunes:summary: "Teresa" emailed in about a Christmas present she was given by a friend of a painting she did of her and her boyfriend.  She looks good in it but her boyfriend looks like Uncle Fester.  Now her friend is moving in with her for a couple months and she's wondering if she has to hang the painting even though she hates it.
